name: Rainbow
description:
This game is a 2d exploratory adventure game. Move through the various monochromatic worlds and solve many puzzles and quizzes.
At the end of it you will know all the secrets!

Characteristics of the game

  • Solve several puzzles in a monochrome world.
  • A game made up of pixel art only.
  • A simple game with only basic moves and investigations (conversations).
  • Get various items from various NPCs while playing the game.
  • Game save is 'only once'. It's like our lives, right?
